alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 5:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jackson, north central Gulf and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, western Gadsden and western Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida, southwestern Decatur and southeastern Seminole Counties in southwestern Georgia through 630 PM EDT/530 PM CDT/... At 542 PM EDT/442 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Greensboro to 12 miles east of Blountstown to 12 miles east of Stonemill Creek. Movement was northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Greensboro, Stonemill Creek, Chattahoochee, Wewahitchka, Orange, Sneads, Gretna, Bristol, Grand Ridge, Altha, Rock Bluff, Clarksville, Ocheesee, Juniper, Douglas City, Selman, Abe Springs, Vilas and Chipola Cutoff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
